https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/caS0bI3byDqwGdrANp1ojufps9d.jpg UFOs appear on Earth, and people who actually see them suddenly find that their blood has turned blue. Soon panic and hysteria result in the new "blue-bloods" being persecuted by the rest of mankind, and eventually certain all-too-familiar measures begin to be taken against them. Blood Type: Blue
